item.title: Help with npc talk... Rep if helped!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

yes just make a new case in UpdateNPCChat

case 11:
sendFrame200(4883, 1981);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Answer”, 2460);
sendFrame126(“Yes il teleport you to the secret land!”, 2461);
sendFrame126(“Well i dont have any quests at the moment come again somtime.”, 2462);
sendFrame164(2459);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

and do NPCWannaTalk = 11;

item.title: Help with npc talk... Rep if helped!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

in client.java ok search for

case 155
or
case 17

case 17 is second option click on NPC
case 155 is first option click on NPC

which npc you want to click? get the NPC ID

else if (NPCID == YOUR_NPC_ID) {
    sendFrame200(4883, 1981);
    sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
    sendFrame126("Answer", 2460);
    sendFrame126("Yes il teleport you to the secret land!", 2461);
    sendFrame126("Well i dont have any quests at the moment come again somtime.", 2462);
    sendFrame164(2459);
    NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

oh… if that doesn’t work remove everything you did above this line.
I havne’t worked with this either I made a anicents magiciks converter npc once. Using code below this line

find

UpdateNPCChat inside client.java

add a new case

like case 11:

copy all your codes in it including the break;

than in the first/second click just include

     else if (NPCID == YOUR_NPC_ID) {
        PutNPCCoords = true;
        NpcWanneTalk = 11; //replace this with your CASE number for dialogue
    }

Read full topic
